Articles.Content:
http://imgur.com/a/1lUjT

So I found that north of the launch pad in the mountains.

Has anyone else ever seen this? reminds me of the monolith from 2001 space odyssey.
Yes, there are more of them, mostly on the Mun.
Just some fun things, there is a plugin that allows finding them, they have no sense but being found by the user...
There\'s one just north of the launch pad, with a decent resolution you should be able to see it every launch. There are about three on the mun, and a lot more on kerbin.

Finding these things is quite a challenge. Feel free to give it a shot. Can you find all three of the Munar ones? They\'re so small as to be nearly invisible until you\'re right on top of them. This challenge kept me busy for a long time.

There\'s one just north of the launch pad, with a decent resolution you should be able to see it every launch. There are about three on the mun, and a lot more on kerbin.

A closer view.

http://i.imgur.com/WNZQo.jpg
I fired guns on it, is that modifying Squad logos by plugin? ;P
